mapper.insert: insert into project_reply(rno, pno, reply, replyer, replydate) values ('rno'||seq_project_reply.nextval, #{pno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update project_reply set reply = #{reply}, proj_reply_update = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from project_reply where pno = #{pno} order by replydate desc
